artist_names: James Marsden, Motion Picture Cast of Hairspray
lyrics:
25 contributorsthe nicest kids in town lyricsintro spoken corny
hey there teenage baltimore
dont change that channel
cause its time for the corny collins show
brought to you by ultra clutch hairspray

verse 1 corny council members
oh every afternoon when the clock strikes four
bop bee bop ba ba ba ba ba bee bop
a crazy bunch of kids crash through that door yeah
bop bee bop ba ba ba ba ba bee bop

chorus 1 corny  all
they throw off their coats and leave the squares behind
and then they shake it shake it shake it like theyre losing their mind
youll never see them frown
cause theyre the nicest kids in town

verse 2 corny council members
oh every afternoon you turn your tv on
na na na na na na na na na
yeah we know you turn the sound up when your parents are gone yeah
na na na na na na na na na

chorus 2 corny  all
then you twist and shout for your favorite star
and when youve practiced every step thats in your repertoire
you better come on down
and meet the nicest kids in town
you might also likebridge corny  all
nice white kids who like to lead the way
and once a month we have our negro day
and im the man who keeps it spinning round
mr corny collins with the latest greatest baltimore sound

verse 3 corny council members
so every afternoon drop everything
bop bee bop ba ba ba ba ba bee bop
who needs to read and write when you can dance and sing
bop bee bop ba ba ba ba ba bee bop

chorus 3 corny  all
forget about your algebra and calculus
you can always do your homework on the morning bus
cant tell a verb from a noun
theyre the nicest kids in town

spoken corny
rrrroll call
council members
im amber brad
tammy fender brenda sketch
shelly iq lou ann joey
mikey vicki becky bix jessie darla pauly noreen doreen
and im link
verse 4 corny council members
so if every night youre shaking as you lie in bed
pony pony ooh pony pony shake it baby
and the bass and drums are pounding in your head
pony pony ooh pony pony

chorus 4 corny  all
who cares about sleep when you can snooze in school
theyll never get to college but theyll sure look cool
dont need a cap or a gown
when youre the nicest kids in town

outro corny  all
theyre the nicest nicest
theyre the nicest nicest
well theyre the sugar n spiceest
nicest kids inkids in town woo2embed
